subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Antawn Jamison and Anthony Parker hit late 3-pointers, Cleveland got 52 points from its bench and the Cavaliers won their third straight game, 93-91 over the reeling Nets.
snippet: Antawn Jamison and Anthony Parker hit late 3-pointers, Cleveland got 52 points from its bench and the Cavaliers won their third straight game, 93-91 over the reeling Nets.
